original_title: Brotherhood Bloodlines: A Hunters' Crossing Story
overview: In this prequel/spin-off of the original Hunters' Crossing, Trevor's twin brother Ford deals with a heap of trouble when he accidentally unleashes a Djinn upon New York City.
tagline: The long-awaited and much asked for prequel to Hunters' Crossing is finally here.
title: Brotherhood Bloodlines: A Hunters' Crossing Story
